### INSTALL ###
## https://sourceforge.net/projects/threadpool/files/threadpool/0.2.5%20%28Stable%29/threadpool-0_2_5-src.zip/download
DKINSTALL(${DKWEB}/Download/Libs/threadpool-0_2_5-src.zip threadpool-0_2_5-src)
DKSET(THREADPOOL ${3RDPARTY}/threadpool-0_2_5-src)


### LINK ###
DKINCLUDE(${THREADPOOL})


### COMPILE ###
